definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: May, who took office earlier this month, is the starkest proponent of this.
sentences.chinese: 本月初就职的梅是这种观念最鲜明的倡导者。

sentences.english: Even so, many activists say they are packing their bags and heading to Washington.
sentences.chinese: 即便这样，许多倡导者说他们要收拾行装上华盛顿。

sentences.english: The advocates of tele-education give their arguments as follows.
sentences.chinese: 远程教育的倡导者给出了他们的论点如下。

sentences.english: The low-salt advocates suggest that all 300 million Americans be subjected to a low-salt diet.
sentences.chinese: 低盐倡导者们建议全美3亿人都加入到低盐饮食中来。

sentences.english: Dehn himself was a particularly enthusiastic advocate of group diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 戴恩本人就特别热衷的群图解的倡导者。

sentences.english: The principle proponent of the Deep Operations theory, Marshal of the Soviet Union, Mikhail Tukhachevsky.
sentences.chinese: 大纵深战略理论的倡导者，苏联元帅，图哈切夫斯基。

sentences.english: Nude-hiking advocates say they aren't out to startle people.
sentences.chinese: 裸体远足倡导者称，他们没有惊吓别人的企图。

sentences.english: He was an untiring advocate of economic reform.
sentences.chinese: 他是个不知疲倦的经济改革的倡导者。

sentences.english: Our efforts in Afghanistan lost a powerful advocate today,” Eikenberry said.
sentences.chinese: 我们在阿富汗的努力今天失去了一位有力的倡导者。

sentences.english: We are the supporter and practioner of Naturalism .
sentences.chinese: 我们是自然主义的实践者和倡导者。

sentences.english: They should become champions and pioneers of character education.
sentences.chinese: 要成为推行素质教育的倡导者和先行官。

sentences.english: OTO FORTUNE stands for the high quality life.
sentences.chinese: 沃德财富是品质生活的倡导者。

sentences.english: Promoters of this computerized highway have great hopes for its future.
sentences.chinese: 这种计算机化公路的倡导者对其未来的应用充满信心。

sentences.english: Amy Hatkoff is a parenting educator, writer, filmmaker, and advocate.
sentences.chinese: 艾米哈特考夫是育儿教育家，作家，导演和倡导者。

sentences.english: But the elated reaction among gay advocates and couples was immediate.
sentences.chinese: 不过同性恋倡导者和同性恋伴侣们立即喜上眉梢。

sentences.english: In the tech world, communities are defined by their staunchest advocates.
sentences.chinese: 在科技界中，社区是由他们最可信赖的倡导者确立的。

definition: to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
